text.astromine.message.holographic_conne: Succeeded in connecting projector at %s with projector at %s.
Failed to connect projector at %s with projector at %s.
text.astromine.patchouli.astronautics.de: From where one dreams, to where their dreams come true.
text.astromine.patchouli.components.desc: Components for crafting items to aid one in their journey.
text.astromine.patchouli.creatures.title: Creatures
text.astromine.patchouli.creatures.descr: Those beyond our wildest realm of imagination.
text.astromine.patchouli.gadgets.title: Gadgets
text.astromine.patchouli.gadgets.descrip: One's physical assistance in their journey.
text.astromine.patchouli.machinery.title: Machinery
text.astromine.patchouli.resources.title: Resources
text.astromine.patchouli.resources.descr: The exquisite materials that one channels for power.
text.astromine.patchouli.warfare.title: Warfare
text.astromine.patchouli.warfare.descrip: What one uses to wipe away their foe.
text.astromine.patchouli.world.title: World
text.astromine.astronautics.space_suit.p: Vital for survival in hostile environments, a Space Suit is the most important thing one may carry. $(p)With internal tanks which may be pressurized in certain machines, it may be filled with (un-)breathable gases fit for whoever is wearing it.
text.astromine.components.circuits.title: Circuits
text.astromine.components.circuits.page_: A basic electric circuit board, built for general systems with no special requirements, whose architecture is based on graphene.
A more advanced electric circuit board, built for systems with low latency in mind, whose architecture is based on graphene.
An elite electric circuit board, built for systems with high throughput and low latency in mind, whose architecture makes use of coveted, laboratory-made materials.
text.astromine.components.gears.title: Gears
text.astromine.components.gears.page_one: A small wheel with teeth, gears interlocked with one another can turn to achieve any number of things.$(p)As such, they will have great use in constructing useful $(thing)machines$().
text.astromine.components.gears.page_two: While the recipe shown is clearly for an $(item)Iron Gear$(), simply substituting the $(item)Iron Ingots$() with any other $(thing)Ingots() will create a gear of that type.
text.astromine.components.plates.title: Plates
text.astromine.components.plates.page_on: Thin sheets of metal, plates are useful for constructing $(thing)housing$() for $(thing)machinery$().
text.astromine.components.plates.page_tw: While the recipe shown is clearly for $(item)Iron Plates$(), simply substituting the $(item)Iron Ingots$() with any other $(thing)Ingots() will create plates of that type.
text.astromine.creatures.space_slime.pag: A fierce adversary which inhabits large sections of traversable space.
Upon defeat, a $(thing)Space Slime$() will drop $(thing)Space Slime Balls$().
A fierce adversary which inhabits large sections of traversable space.
Upon defeat, a $(thing)Space Slime$() will drop $(thing)Space Slime Balls$().
text.astromine.gadgets.fire_extinguisher: An important tool in one's space journeys, it is responsible for providing maneuverable thrust.$(p)Surprisingly, it can also extinguish fire.
text.astromine.gadgets.holographic_bridg: A block which generates a holographic bridge between it and another one of its kind; they can be linked with a $(item)$(l:gadgets/holographic_connector)Holographic Connector$().
text.astromine.gadgets.holographic_conne: A remote controller which allows you to link together $(item)$(l:gadgets/holographic_bridge_projector)Holographic Bridge Projectors$(). They must be facing each other in the same line, but can have different heights.
text.astromine.machinery.creative_buffer: A machine which produces a specified $(thing)item$() infinitely.
text.astromine.machinery.creative_tank.p: A machine which produces a specified $(thing)fluid$() infinitely.
text.astromine.machinery.electric_smelte: A machine which consumes $(thing)energy$() to smelt $(thing)items$() into useful materials.
text.astromine.machinery.electrolyzer.pa: A machine which consumes $(thing)energy$() to electrolyze $(thing)fluids$() into useful materials.
text.astromine.machinery.energy_cable.pa: A cable which transports $(thing)energy$(); no buffering or path-finding involved.
text.astromine.machinery.fluid_cable.pag: A cable which transports $(thing)fluids(); no buffering or path-finding involved.
text.astromine.machinery.fluid_extractor: A machine which consumes $(thing)energy$() to pick up $(thing)fluids$() from the world.
text.astromine.machinery.fuel_mixer.page: A machine which consumes $(thing)energy$() to mix $(thing)fluids$() into useful materials.
text.astromine.machinery.sorter.title: Sorter
text.astromine.machinery.sorter.page_one: A machine which consumes $(thing)energy$() to sort $(thing)items$() into useful materials.
text.astromine.machinery.vent.title: Vent
text.astromine.machinery.vent.page_one.t: A machine which consumes energy to ventilate fluids into the atmosphere.
text.astromine.resources.asterite.title: Asterite
text.astromine.resources.asterite.page_o: A fragment of a long dead star, this red gem may look frail to an untrained observer - one who does not know its significant strengths. $(p)Its properties allow for qualified craftsmen to create powerful tooling.
text.astromine.resources.asterite.page_t: $(item)Asterite Ore$() can be found inside $(thing)$(l:world/asteroids)Asteroids$() in $(thing)Space$().$(p)Mining requires a $(item)Netherite Pickaxe$() (Mining Level 4) or better, usually resulting in a single $(item)Asterite Cluster$() which can forged into an $(item)Asterite$() gem.
Asterite can be used to create powerful tooling.
text.astromine.resources.asterite.page_f: $(l)Tools$()$(br)Mining Level: 5$(br)Base Durability: 2015$(br)Mining Speed: 10$(br)Attack Damage: 5$(br)Enchantability: 20$(p)$(l)Armor$()$(br)Durability Multiplier: 22$(br)Total Defense: 23$(br)Toughness: 4$(br)Enchantability: 20
text.astromine.resources.galaxium.title: Galaxium
text.astromine.resources.galaxium.page_o: A rare gem with a deep, overwhelming dark shine. Extraordinarily dense, this material is theorized to be obtained from large clusters at the center of galaxies.$(p)There are no records of such phenomena, but one's journey holds the keys to many secrets never thought of before.
text.astromine.resources.galaxium.page_t: $(item)Galaxium Ore$() can be rarely found inside $(thing)$(l:world/asteroids)Asteroids$() in $(thing)Space$().$(p)Galaxium Ore mining will require an $(item)Asterite Pickaxe$() (Mining Level 5) or better, usually resulting in a single $(item)$(l:world/ore_clusters)Galaxium Cluster$() which can be forged into a $(item)Galaxium$() gem.
Galaxium can be used to create extremely resistant tooling and exquisite technology.
text.astromine.resources.galaxium.page_f: $(l)Tools$()$(br)Mining Level: 6$(br)Base Durability: 3072$(br)Mining Speed: 11$(br)Attack Damage: 5$(br)Enchantability: 18$(p)$(l)Armor$()$(br)Durability Multiplier: 44$(br)Total Defense: 25$(br)Toughness: 4.5$(br)Enchantability: 18
text.astromine.resources.metite.title: Metite
text.astromine.resources.metite.page_one: A foreign metal, Metite withstands immense pressures; being essential in all areas of space travel.$(p)Acquiring it is considered a major stepping stone in one's interstellar journey.
text.astromine.resources.metite.page_two: $(item)Metite Ore$() can be found inside $(thing)$(l:world/meteors)Meteors$() which have impacted on $(thing)Earth$(), or in $(thing)$(l:world/asteroids)Asteroids$() in $(thing)Space$().$(p)Mining requires a $(item)Netherite Pickaxe$() (Mining Level 4) or better, usually resulting in between 1 and 3 $(item)$(l:world/ore_clusters)Metite Clusters$() which can forged into a $(item)Metite Ingot$().
text.astromine.resources.metite.page_thr: Metite can be used to create standard tooling; however, it is of much more use in creating astronautical technology.
text.astromine.resources.metite.page_fou: $(l)Tools$()$(br)Mining Level: 2$(br)Base Durability: 981$(br)Mining Speed: 14$(br)Attack Damage: 5$(br)Enchantability: 5$(p)$(l)Armor$()$(br)Durability Multiplier: 15$(br)Total Defense: 14$(br)Toughness: 0$(br)Enchantability: 7
text.astromine.resources.stellum.title: Stellum
text.astromine.resources.stellum.page_on: A fragment of a living star, the raw energy contained within this material is surpassed only by few, every molecule of it vibrating with $(thing)Stellar Energy$().
text.astromine.resources.stellum.page_tw: $(item)Stellum Ore$() can be found inside $(thing)$(l:world/asteroids)Asteroids$() in $(thing)Space$().$(p)Mining requires an $(item)Asterite Pickaxe$() (Mining Level 5) or better, usually resulting in a single $(item)$(l:world/ore_clusters)Stellum Cluster$() which can be forged into a $(item)Stellum Ingot$().
text.astromine.resources.stellum.page_th: Stellum can be used to create powerful tooling roughly equivalent to $(thing)$(l:resources/asterite)Asterite$(). Born from the heart of a living star, it is fire proof to an extent never seen before; and posses a power that, when harnessed, can power an entire civilization.
text.astromine.resources.stellum.page_fo: $(l)Tools$()$(br)Mining Level: 5$(br)Base Durability: 2643$(br)Mining Speed: 8$(br)Attack Damage: 6$(br)Enchantability: 15$(br)Fireproof$(p)$(l)Armor$()$(br)Durability Multiplier: 41$(br)Total Defense: 16$(br)Toughness: 6$(br)Enchantability: 15$(br)Fireproof
text.astromine.resources.univite.title: Univite
text.astromine.resources.univite.page_on: A material so highly coveted it has sparked numerous interstellar wars; only a limited amount of it exists within this realm, thought to have originated at the heart of the universe, before any of us even dared the thought of existence. It is unknown whether any material conveys higher power than Univite.
text.astromine.resources.univite.page_tw: A theorized origin and limited existence means immense difficulty in being obtained; with no way but theft available to small civilizations.
text.astromine.resources.univite.page_th: Univite can be used to create the strongest tooling and weaponry known by all discovered civilizations.
text.astromine.resources.univite.page_fo: $(l)Tools$()$(br)Mining Level: 7$(br)Base Durability: 3918$(br)Mining Speed: 12$(br)Attack Damage: 6$(br)Enchantability: 22$(br)Fireproof$(p)$(l)Armor$()$(br)Durability Multiplier: 50$(br)Total Defense: 27$(br)Toughness: 5$(br)Enchantability: 22$(br)Fireproof
text.astromine.warfare.nuclear_warhead.p: A bomb capable of devastating destruction, terminating all life-forms in the process.
text.astromine.world.asteroid_ores.title: Asteroid Ores
text.astromine.world.asteroid_ores.page_: Veins of ores found in $(thing)$(l:world/asteroids)asteroids$(), which may be harvested for resources.$(p)When mined, will drop their respective $(thing)$(l:world/ore_clusters)ore clusters$().
text.astromine.world.asteroids.title: Asteroids
Foreign bodies found cruising through interstellar space, in rings, clusters and many other formations; said to contain large quantities of $(thing)$(l:world/asteroid_ores)ores$().
text.astromine.world.meteor_ores.title: Meteor Ores
text.astromine.world.meteor_ores.page_on: Veins of ores found in $(thing)$(l:world/meteors)meteors$(), which may be harvested for resources.$(p)When mined, will drop their respective $(thing)$(l:world/ore_clusters)ore clusters$().
text.astromine.world.meteors.title: Meteors
text.astromine.world.meteors.page_one.te: Foreign bodies that, cruising through the stairs, collided with a planetary body; said to contain $(thing)$(l:world/meteor_ores)extraterrestrial ores$().
text.astromine.world.ore_clusters.title: Ore Clusters
text.astromine.world.ore_clusters.page_o: Clusters of ores obtained from $(thing)$(l:world/asteroid_ores)asteroid ores$() or $(thing)$(l:world/meteor_ores)meteor ores$(), which may be processed for resources.
